SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Inscr. "Nannie Jacquelin Minor Richmond, Virginia. E.R.G.C.(?) June 1900." From the Papers of the Venable, Minor, Wilson and related families, MSS 3750-d. Gift of Walter Klingman, June, 1996.
